languages.text:
Give {uip|StatBonus|171462027afe4bc6be83799f44fa9995} additional willpower in combat.
At the start of combat, the character receives a Fervour point value equal to their willpower bonus.
For each new enemy attacked with a bolter, melta, flamethrower, chain or power weapon, the character receives 1 Fervour point.
If a xenos or demon is killed, they receive 2 points.

traits.locale_text:
Give {uip|StatBonus|171462027afe4bc6be83799f44fa9995} additional willpower in combat.
At the start of combat, the character receives a Fervour point value equal to their willpower bonus.
For each new enemy attacked with a bolter, melta, flamethrower, chain or power weapon, the character receives 1 Fervour point.
If a xenos or demon is killed, they receive 2 points.

languages.text:
In combat, the Ministorum Priest gains +{uip|StatBonus|171462027afe4bc6be83799f44fa9995} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
At the start of combat, they gain {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} stacks of {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}zeal{/g}. They gain +1 stack of {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}zeal{/g} for each enemy they attack with a bolter, a flamer, or a chain, melta, or power weapon for the first time in combat. They gain +2 stacks of {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}zeal{/g} for each daemon or xenos killed in combat by any source.

traits.locale_text:

At the start of combat, they gain {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} stacks of {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}fervour{/g}. They gain +1 stack of {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}fervour{/g} for each enemy they attack with a bolter, a flamer, or a chain, melta, or power weapon for the first time in combat. They gain +2 stacks of {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}fervour{/g} for each daemon or xenos killed in combat by any source.

They gain +1 stack of {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}zeal{/g} for each enemy they attack with a bolter, a flamer, or a chain, melta, or power weapon for the first time in combat. languages.text:
戦い時に、司祭が+{uip|StatBonus|171462027afe4bc6be83799f44fa9995} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}を得る。
戦いが始まると、司祭が{g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}熱心{/g}の{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}スタックを得る。初めてボルト、フレイマー、チェーン、メルタ、パワー武器で攻撃すると、司祭の+1{g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}熱心{/g}のスタックを得る。殺したディーモンとゼノにつき、司祭が+2{g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}熱心{/g}のスタックを得る。

They gain +1 stack of {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}zeal{/g} for each enemy they attack with a bolter, a flamer, or a chain, melta, or power weapon for the first time in combat. They gain +2 stacks of {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}zeal{/g} for each daemon or xenos killed in combat by any source.

traits.locale_text:
戦い時に、司祭が+{uip|StatBonus|171462027afe4bc6be83799f44fa9995} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}を得る。
戦いが始まると、司祭が{g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}熱心{/g}の{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}スタックを得る。初めてボルト、フレイマー、チェーン、メルタ、パワー武器で攻撃すると、司祭の+1{g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}熱心{/g}のスタックを得る。殺したディーモンとゼノにつき、司祭が+2{g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}熱心{/g}のスタックを得る。

languages.text:
Священник Адептус Министорум получает +{uip|StatBonus|171462027afe4bc6be83799f44fa9995} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} в бою.
В начале боя священник получает {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} уровней {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}пыла{/g}. Затем он получает 1 уровень {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}пыла{/g} за каждого врага, атакованного им с помощью болтерного, цепного, мельта- и силового оружия или огнемета. Еще 2 уровня {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}пыла{/g} он получает за каждого демона или ксеноса, убитого в бою кем угодно.

traits.locale_text:
Священник Адептус Министорум получает +{uip|StatBonus|171462027afe4bc6be83799f44fa9995} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} в бою.
В начале боя священник получает {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} уровней {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}пыла{/g}. Затем он получает 1 уровень {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}пыла{/g} за каждого врага, атакованного им с помощью болтерного, цепного, мельта- и силового оружия или огнемета. Еще 2 уровня {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}пыла{/g} он получает за каждого демона или ксеноса, убитого в бою кем угодно.

languages.text:
Au combat, le prêtre du Ministorum gagne un bonus de +{uip|StatBonus|171462027afe4bc6be83799f44fa9995} à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}.
Au début du combat, il reçoit {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} cumuls de {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}Zèle{/g}, plus 1 cumul supplémentaire pour chaque ennemi qu'il attaque pour la première fois avec un bolter, un lance-flamme, une arme tronçonneuse, une arme à fusion ou une arme énergétique.{g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}{/g} Il obtient également +2 cumuls de {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}Zèle{/g} pour chaque démon ou xénos tué au combat de quelque manière que ce soit.
languages.original_text:
In combat, the Ministorum Priest gains +{uip|StatBonus|171462027afe4bc6be83799f44fa9995} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.

They gain +1 stack of {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}zeal{/g} for each enemy they attack with a bolter, a flamer, or a chain, melta, or power weapon for the first time in combat. They gain +2 stacks of {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}zeal{/g} for each daemon or xenos killed in combat by any source.

Au combat, le prêtre du Ministorum gagne un bonus de +{uip|StatBonus|171462027afe4bc6be83799f44fa9995} à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}.
Au début du combat, il reçoit {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} cumuls de {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}Zèle{/g}, plus 1 cumul supplémentaire pour chaque ennemi qu'il attaque pour la première fois avec un bolter, un lance-flamme, une arme tronçonneuse, une arme à fusion ou une arme énergétique.{g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}{/g} Il obtient également +2 cumuls de {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}Zèle{/g} pour chaque démon ou xénos tué au combat de quelque manière que ce soit.

languages.text:
En combate, el sacerdote del Ministorum gana +{uip|StatBonus|171462027afe4bc6be83799f44fa9995} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}.
Al inicio del combate, gana {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} acumulaciones de {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}devoción{/g}. Gana +1 acumulación de {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}devoción{/g} por cada enemigo al que ataque con un bólter, lanzallamas, arma sierra, arma de fusión o arma de energía por primera vez en combate. Gana +2 acumulaciones de {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}devoción{/g} por cada daemon o xenos que mate en combate de cualquier forma.
languages.original_text:

They gain +2 stacks of {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}zeal{/g} for each daemon or xenos killed in combat by any source.

Al inicio del combate, gana {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} acumulaciones de {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}devoción{/g}. Gana +1 acumulación de {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}devoción{/g} por cada enemigo al que ataque con un bólter, lanzallamas, arma sierra, arma de fusión o arma de energía por primera vez en combate. Gana +2 acumulaciones de {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}devoción{/g} por cada daemon o xenos que mate en combate de cualquier forma.

languages.text:
战斗期间，国教牧师的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}提高{uip|StatBonus|171462027afe4bc6be83799f44fa9995}点。
战斗开始时，国教牧师获得{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}层{g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}狂热{/g}效果。每当国教牧师在战斗中首次使用爆矢枪、火焰喷射器、链锯武器、热熔武器或能量武器攻击一名新的敌人时，就会获得1层{g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}狂热{/g}效果；每当战斗中有恶魔或异形由于任意效果死亡时，都会获得2层{g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}狂热{/g}效果。
languages.original_text:
In combat, the Ministorum Priest gains +{uip|StatBonus|171462027afe4bc6be83799f44fa9995} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
At the start of combat, they gain {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} stacks of {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}zeal{/g}. They gain +1 stack of {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}zeal{/g} for each enemy they attack with a bolter, a flamer, or a chain, melta, or power weapon for the first time in combat. They gain +2 stacks of {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}zeal{/g} for each daemon or xenos killed in combat by any source.

traits.locale_text:
战斗期间，国教牧师的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}提高{uip|StatBonus|171462027afe4bc6be83799f44fa9995}点。
战斗开始时，国教牧师获得{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}层{g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}狂热{/g}效果。每当国教牧师在战斗中首次使用爆矢枪、火焰喷射器、链锯武器、热熔武器或能量武器攻击一名新的敌人时，就会获得1层{g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}狂热{/g}效果；每当战斗中有恶魔或异形由于任意效果死亡时，都会获得2层{g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}狂热{/g}效果。

languages.text:
Im Kampf erhält der Priester des Ministorum +{uip|StatBonus|171462027afe4bc6be83799f44fa9995} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}.
Zu Beginn des Kampfes erhält er {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} Stapel {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}Eifer{/g}. Er erhält +1 Stapel {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}Eifer{/g} von jedem Gegner, den er im Kampf erstmals mit einem Bolter, einem Flammenwerfer oder einer Ketten-, Melter- oder Energiewaffe attackiert. Er erhält +2 Stapel {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}Eifer{/g} für jeden mit einer beliebigen Waffe getöteten Dämon oder Xenos.

They gain +1 stack of {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}zeal{/g} for each enemy they attack with a bolter, a flamer, or a chain, melta, or power weapon for the first time in combat. They gain +2 stacks of {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}zeal{/g} for each daemon or xenos killed in combat by any source.

Er erhält +1 Stapel {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}Eifer{/g} von jedem Gegner, den er im Kampf erstmals mit einem Bolter, einem Flammenwerfer oder einer Ketten-, Melter- oder Energiewaffe attackiert. Er erhält +2 Stapel {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}Eifer{/g} für jeden mit einer beliebigen Waffe getöteten Dämon oder Xenos.

languages.text:
Ministorum Rahibi, çatışmadayken +{uip|StatBonus|171462027afe4bc6be83799f44fa9995} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliği kazanır.
Çatışmanın başlangıcında {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}hamiyet{/g} birikimi kazanır. Çatışmada ilk kez bulonatar, alevsaçan, motorlu silah, melta silahı veya güç silahı ile saldırdığı her düşman için +1 {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}hamiyet{/g} birikimi kazanır. Çatışmada herhangi bir şekilde öldürdüğü her iblis veya zeno için +2 {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}hamiyet{/g} birikimi kazanır.
